titles.title: To amend the FAST Act to ensure that certain veteran small businesses are eligible for funding as small business concerns.
Service Disabled Veteran Infrastructure Investment Parity Act
Service Disabled Veteran Infrastructure Investment Parity Act
Service Disabled Veteran Infrastructure Investment Parity Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
